item.title: C++ Template: A Quick UpToDate Look(C++11/14/17/20)
item.description: I know, itâ€™s been a while since the last time I published something newbies-friendly on my blog. The main reason is that most of my readers are either experienced devs or from C background having modest C++ encounter. But while programming in C++ you need a completely different mindset as both C & C++ belongs to different programming paradigm. And I always strive to show them a better way of doing things in C++.
